review: It was very easy to install.  Our current television is almost 8 years old which could explain the one issue, "HDCP unauthorized. Content disabled"  We had to call for technical help and we followed their directions below for power cycling. Hope this helps you if you are experiencing the same thing.1. Remove the Fire TV Stick from the television2. Unplug the Fire TV Stick and the television from power3. Leave both devices unplugged for two minutes4. After two minutes, plug the power back in for the television5. Plug the power cable back in to the Fire TV Stick6. Connect the Fire TV Stick to the television's HDMI port
author: J. Patterson

Also, if I attempt to view one of the prime movies or tv shows, it loses connection with the internet. When I go to settings it sais it is connected and the signal strength is "very good."
